response.overview: The story of the Chhattisgarhi film Dahaad is about a retired school teacher who lives in the city for a long time, thinking of why he doesn't go to the village and live a happy life, he comes to his village where he helps people and village. On the other hand, the head of the village, who is trying to grab the village's land and sell it for a big factory, all the villagers tell him that Master ji has come to the village now and he is a very good person. Time becomes election environment in the villageThe villagers want to make Master ji as the chief, when the chief is a staunch opponent of him, he explains to the master and if he does not agree, he gets the master killed. The master has 3 sons who live in the city. comes and starts fighting without roaring the head of the village, in the climax, the chief is killed and the villagers live happily ever after.
response.title: Dahaad
